short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access to Chrome developer pages in the context menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wondered what was under the hood of your favorite browser?

With this extension, you can access the Google Chrome internal tools in the context menu.
